articles.author: Sohil Sehran
articles.title: ‘Mausam badalne…': In Lok Sabha, Abhishek Banerjee quotes from SRK's film to attack PM Modi - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Abhishek Banerjee said the 2024 Lok Sabha election result was the direct audit of the performance of Prime Minister Narendra Modi. | Latest News India
articles.content: Trinamool Congress Lok Sabha MP Abhishek Banerjee said on Wednesday that Prime Minister Narendra Modi was in power on borrowed time and quoted Shah Rukh Khans line mausam badalne wala hai from the mo… [+1672 chars]
